A man has been arrested on suspicion of sexually assaulting an eight-year-old girl in a bakery.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
The child was assaulted in Greggs at The Headrow in Leeds while her mother was at the counter, West Yorkshire Police said.
It happened at about 15:30 GMT on 12 February.
The arrested man - a 34-year-old from the Bradford area - was released on bail pending further enquiries.
Summary:
